entry.title: Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP) Preparation
entry.summary: Introduction This post describes the journey of what I went through while preparing for my OSCP exam. I had earlier given exams like Junior Penetration Tester (eJPT) from eLearn Security and Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) v10, but OSCP is no where close to the level of anxiety and preparation that is involved. How it started It all started when I was given the oppurtunity by my organisation...
